answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!These are either boils caused by pseudomonas bacteria or it is STD tichomoniasis or it is due to bacterial vaginosis. Infected Bartholin cysts are also a possibility. You could also be having diabetes which is making the infection more severe.Please consult a gynecologist. Take care!

question: I was recently tested for all STD's but, diagnosed and treated for Chlamydia, two weeks later I have red bumps and sores on my vagina which are very painful. I have a thick yellow greenish discharge also. This is very uncomfortable can someone please help me!!!
title: Sores and bumps on the vagina Please Help!
